## Aggregate the mean and variance of the estimated unit-level DiD effects {.unnumbered} ### Description Aggregate the mean and variance of the estimated unit-level DiD effects ### Usage 
## S3 method for class 'unitdid'
summary(object, ...)
### Arguments
object unitdid object
... aggregate_unitdid arguments
### Value A tibble with the summary statistics ### Examples ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library("unitdid") library(unitdid) mdl_base <- base_heterocp |> unitdid(yname = "y", iname = "id", tname = "year", ename = "cyear", bname = "byear") summary(mdl_base, agg = "event_age") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 144 × 4 mean rel_time n event_age 1 -0.0344 0 13 15 2 -0.0860 0 42 16 3 -0.170 0 59 17 4 -0.141 0 79 18 5 -0.0883 0 99 19 6 -0.0689 0 107 20 7 -0.115 0 158 21 8 -0.0684 0 165 22 9 -0.0778 0 168 23 10 -0.0567 0 206 24 # ℹ 134 more rows ``` ::: :::
